k4 repeat 3x p k1 p2tog if you picked option 1 when finishing the right side just cut the yarn at 5-10 cm 2 -4 if you picked option 2 when finishing the right side cast off the 60 stitches froggybug 2-in-1 seahorse v3 page 10 of 16 coronet the first 2 row of the coronet are to join the two sides the 3rd row is casting off adding 8 spikes one on the top of each ridge the 4 first ones are separated by 4 stitches and the last ones by 7 stitches row 1 row 2 if you picked option 1 using either a dpn or a 3 needles knit together circular needle with coronet colour yarn knit all 60 using a third needle knit together the 1st stitch of stitches from the right side from the neck to the tail each needle then the second stitch and so on until then using another needle or folding the circular the end needle knit all 60
